games.name: Roll A Ball Derby Horse Racing
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Turtles In Time
Enter the Gungeon: House of the Gundead

events.name: Tavern Party
events.headline: Costumes, laughter, and so much more.
events.summary: Join us for a night of revelry like no other! From open to close, come in your best fantasy cosplay and enjoy all food and drinks at half-off! Additionally, the person cosplay voted as the best will receive an Oculus 7 and the first-edition version of the newest VR D&D: A Thieve's Tale game!

events.name: Dance Tournament
events.headline: Time to boogy! Bring your best moves, and prove the 80s never die!
events.summary: It's a revolution. A Dance Dance Revolution that is!! Let your passion take you as we host the city's largest dance-off! For the next 3 days, challenge yourself to greater heights and get the highest score! The top 32 will have a grand slam face-off on February 8th, 2023 for the title of Ultimate Dance Champion and a $10,000 grand prize!

events.name: Drinking & Dragons
events.headline: Great food, fine wine, and the best Dungeons & Dragons around!
events.summary: What better way to celebrate national Pi day than with pie...and D&D! That's right, it's time to crack out the ol' figuines and dust off those dice! For today and today only, we are hosting unique, never-before-played D&D modules hosted by professional DMs! But that's not all, we are also introducing 3 new types of pies and 20 different types of wine for players to enjoy as they play. So come on by!

events.name: Race Tournament
events.headline: Put the pedal to the metal and prove yourself to be the very best!
events.summary: This is no April Fool's Joke! We are hosting an all-around race tournament. For the next week, we will be competing on every racing machine, 1 game per day. The cusotmer with the highest score will have their portrait placed on the Hall of Flame and receive the mystery grand prize of the day, guaranteed to blow your socks off! Race! Compete! Win! Whether for glory, for honor, for riches, or some other crazy reason, come on down and show your skills!

events.name: Rockin' it Retro Style
events.alt: Retro image of car in digital universe
events.headline: Retro Arcade Tournament Extraordinaire!!! Let's get to playing!
events.summary: It's a tournament of the best of the best, the ultimate retro arcde game experience. Face off against you competitors in this high stakes competition to find the one person who can prove that the oldies never go out of style! More details to come!

rooms.name: D&D Room
rooms.content: A private room for your D&D escapades, what more needs explaining! With 5 rooms available and a max capacity of 10 people each, why hesitate? Get your room now, cuz you deserve it! For more details, click below.

rooms.name: Karaoke Room
rooms.content: With 4 different karaoke rooms, each having enough capacity for parties of up to 20, it's a guaranteed great time for all ages! You can pick from thousands of popular songs, adjust the lighting to set your stage, and compete to see who can score the highest with out Karaoke Dream 3000. Click below for more details!

rooms.name: VR Sandbox
rooms.content: Three rooms with built-in VR support technologies and enough room for up to 8 people. Take on the forces of Mordor with sword and magic, repulse the zombie hoard with modern weaponry, have a glorious duel with the siths (or the jedi, we don't judge). With over 20 scenarios to choose from, we guarantee you'll never get bored! Click below for more details!
